contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|abba}} '''[[ABBA]]''' is a Swedish pop music group. '''Abba''' may also refer to: * [[ABBA (album)|''ABBA'' (album)]], a self-titled album by the Swedish pop music group ABBA * ''[[ABBA: The Movie]]'', a feature length film about the pop group ABBA's 1977 Australian tour * ''Abba'', a song by Christian pop and rock artist, Rebecca St. James * ABBA, in poetry, a rhyming pattern of a [[quatrain]] * ''Abba'', a manga about a man looking for his brother by [[Tsutomu Nihei]] * [[Abba Seafood]], a Swedish seafood products company * [[Ab (Semitic)|Abba]], word for ''father'' in Arameic language * [[Abba (surname)]] * [[Abba (given name)]], and honorific * [[Abbà Pater]], a devotional album from Pope John Paul II released in 1999 in anticipation of the Great Jubilee for Radio Vaticana Places named '''Abba''': * [[Abba, Anambra State]], a place in [[Anambra State]], Nigeria * [[Abba, Imo State]], a place in Imo State, Nigeria * [[Abba River]], a river in Western Australia == See also == * [[ABA (disambiguation)]] * [[Aba (disambiguation)]] * [[Abas (disambiguation)]] * [[Abu (disambiguation)]] * [[Av]] ({{lang|he|''אָב''}}, <small>Standard</small> ''Av'' <small>Tiberian</small> ''{{Unicode|ʾĀḇ}}'' ; from Akkadian ''abu''), the eleventh month of the civil year and the fifth month of the ecclesiastical year on the Hebrew calendar * ''[[Abba Abba]]'', a short novel by Anthony Burgess {{disambig|geo}}
